Room.Name: Walk of Heroes
Room.ShortDescription: Here the crushed gravel path is lined with statues in honor of the heroes.
Room.LongDescription: The walk has statues erected in honor of the heroes of Oceancrest. When a great hero dies, be it by old age or by less fortunate means, and should the powers that be deem he or she worthy, a monument is erected in their memory. Small paths lead off the walk towards the burial sites of some of the greatest heroes in Oceancrest's history.
